page.title: 14Leisure in Kingswood.
page.content: The main places for{leisure}in our area are{Soundwell Swimming Pool}and {Page Park}in Staple Hill. In Page Park there are{tennis courts,}a {bowling green}and two childrens'play areas. It also has a small aviary which has many different kinds of birds in it.They are also constructing an area for the blind. Soundwell Swimming Pool has a learners pool and a big pool with three diving boards. Upstairs is a cafe and video games. There are plans to turn Soundwell Pool into a{Leisure Centre.}There are lots of{footpaths}around Staple Hill, Mangotsfield and Downend. There is also the Bristol and Bath Railway Path and{Cycle Route}which is 15 miles long.It starts at Lawrence Hill, Bristol and ends at Bath. You can walk or cycle but you cannot ride a motorcycle on the track.
